name: hackbot (dreaman) (dreaman)
description:
Here is a new, fun virtual tool for you: Hackbot!

  • Program it via the [Arrow Keys] 
  • Let it execute your program by pressing [Enter]
  • Save your program after the execution with [S]
  • When you restart the level, load your saved program with [L]

The game automatically saves your progess after clearing any level.

There is a total of 26 Levels to explore!

I hope you have great fun solving the levels, and also trying to find the shortest program possible for each level, to achieve a Coding Star!

*****

Developer Note:

This challenging puzzle game is one that i started creating a long time ago, and i worked it over and over to optimize it, and then i let it rest for years. I finally decided to let it see daylight here and i hope it can bring some joy and inspiration!
